Class ChunkingHandler

org.drasyl.remote.handler.ChunkingHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Handler
public class ChunkingHandler extends SimpleDuplexHandler<RemoteEnvelope<? extends com.google.protobuf.MessageLite>,RemoteEnvelope<? extends com.google.protobuf.MessageLite>,InetSocketAddressWrapper>
This handler is responsible for merging incoming message chunks into a single message as well as splitting outgoing too large messages into chunks.
